about_the_game:
This short story in comic book format tells the story of events that took place before the Creepy Creepy Love game. The story also tells you more about Rosa Akuma's biography and the Ribasu family business.

Once downloaded, you will be able to open the «Creepy Creepy Love: Alternative comic book» through the game files using the “View Local Files” feature in Steam or through your operating system's file browser.
